mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews(r_no, seller_nick, nickname, passwd, t_category , title, content, userid, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, wdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(r_no), 0)+1 as r_no FROM reviews), #{seller_nick}, #{nickname}, #{passwd}, #{t_category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userid}, #{thumb}, #{file1}, #{size1}, #{file2}, #{size2}, #{file3}, #{size3}, #{file4}, #{size4}, #{file5}, #{size5}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT r_no, seller_nick, nickname, passwd, t_category, title, content, userid, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, wdate FROM reviews WHERE r_no=#{r_no}

SELECT SELECT r_no, title, t_category, seller_nick, nickname, r_cnt, wdate, p_cnt, thumb FROM reviews
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE t_category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR t_category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM reviews
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE t_category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE nickname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR t_category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT r_no, title, t_category, seller_nick, nickname, r_cnt, wdate, thumb, r FROM( SELECT r_no, title, t_category, seller_nick, nickname, r_cnt, wdate, thumb, rownum as r FROM( SELECT r_no, title, t_category, seller_nick, nickname, r_cnt, wdate, thumb FROM reviews
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE nickname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR t_category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
